ValidationRule.description: Implementation cannot be completed until Matrix 07C Account number is entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(NOT(ISBLANK( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ))) && ISPICKVAL( Custodian__c , "MG Trust Company, LLC.") && ISBLANK( Matrix_07C_Account__c )
||
(ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c, "New Plan") && ISBLANK(Intro_to_Koncierge_CST__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Custodian__c , "MG Trust Company, LLC.") && ISBLANK( Matrix_07C_Account__c ))
||
(ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c, "Conversion Plan") && ISBLANK( Intro_to_Koncierge_CST__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Custodian__c , "MG Trust Company, LLC.") && ISBLANK( Matrix_07C_Account__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Matrix 07C Account Number before moving forward.
